TopicTitle: 3 man Duna land and return rocket??

Articles.Content:
Landed Jeb on Duna and he need's rescuing! Having some real trouble with a 3 man rescue rocket that's totally stock.

Just cant quite get the bugger into SOL orbit without it taking forever!

Basically, as soon as I reach a decent orbit I'm down to my nerva stage.

Looked all over the forum for a totally stock (no mechjeb) rocket but had no luck. If there's anyone out there that's done it and wouldn't mind sticking a photo up, it'd be much appreciated!

Cheers!

Here you go

Uses the NERVA stage to get out of Kerbin parking orbit, but that's OK because it has a hilarious amount of fuel.
I humbly submit my recent design -
Thank's for that Wayfare. Will give a shot:)
Whoe!!! You guy's are quick! Cheers sega.
